title: Balance of Power: Jeffco School Board race
text:
Balance of Power: Jeffco School Board race Three conservative reformers face a recall challenger and two seats are at the end of their terms. Post to Facebook Balance of Power: Jeffco School Board race Three conservative reformers face a recall challenger and two seats are at the end of their terms.  //on9news.tv/1N0QMgF   Join the Conversation To   Balance of Power: Jeffco School Board race What the Jefferson County School Board election means for the district and beyond. Brandon Rittiman, KUSA 9:24 a.m. MDT October 25, 2015 Balance of Power airs every Sunday at 8:50 a.m. on 9NEWS. (Photo: KUSA) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
KUSA— Members of the Jefferson County School board get paid nothing for the job, yet hundreds of thousands of dollars are pouring in to influence the outcome of the 2015 election. 
All five seats are up for grabs. 
Three conservative reformers face a recall challenger and two seats are at the end of their terms. 
On today's program, 9NEWS education reporter Nelson Garcia and political analyst Floyd Ciruli take a look at the politics at play—and how they could affect education in Jeffco and beyond. 
Balance of Power airs every Sunday at 8:50am on 9NEWS, right before NBC's Meet the Press. Episodes and extended interviews are posted on Sundays to 9NEWS.com. 
YOUR THOUGHTS: connect with Balance of Power on Twitter and Facebook to send us your questions and comments. You can also send us an email. ( politics@9news.com )
